name: Fam Slam: Together
description:
Team up with a group of heroic indie game devs - each with their own special abilities - in their quest to defeat a great evil.

CONTROLS ( best on gamepad) 

Gamepad:

D-Pad - Move Left / Right
Y - Cycle Characters
A - Jump
Left/Right Bumper - Activate Abilities
Start - Pause

Keyboard / Mouse
A/D - Move Left / Right
Tab - Cycle Characters
Space - Jump
Left Click / Right Click - Activate Abilities

ATTRIBUTIONS

PixelMix Font by Andrew Tyler 
Stage 3 Music by sawsquarenoise
